Name: Eldrador® Creatures
About the game: Plunge into the world of Eldrador® Creatures in this turn-based strategy game. Go into combat together with your favourite Eldrador® Creatures in the Battle of the 4 Worlds and defeat the other factions so that you can call the powerful Superweapon your own and rule over Eldrador! • 20 playable original Eldrador® Creatures, including new creatures like the Rock Beast and the Shadow Panther, as well as the exclusive Eldrador® Mini Creatures • Use the special abilities of your chosen creatures to defeat your opponents in tactical combat • Battle in all 4 gameworld settings: Lava, Ice, Stone and Jungle ! • Dynamic worlds due to toppling elements like walls and bridges
